text: Ia uan apanibagh ifueghɨva, deravɨra me damuva, eghɨva biziba pura me danɨngɨva, uamategh da ikarvaziba inɨsɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ. Ezɨ God arazir aghuiba gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba koma gumazir a mɨnabir puvatɨzibagh ami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gɨn ian ivezim bar ekeveghtɨma, ia Godɨn bar pɨn itimɨn boribar mɨn ikiam.
